fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, disguise yourself as any Red team role.
- Backstab a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The color of this role in the bot is #0000FF.
- If a player dies, their cause of death appears to be the Red role you're disguised as.
- Red team players will see you as a Red team member. Blu team players will still see you as a Blu team member.
